hero.hello: We kindly ask you to the dental clinics. Our goal is to keep your teeth healthy. We have given a lot of respect to him to create
hero.hello-accent: a more stylish, high-tech, yet more comfortable solution for all our patients.
hero.name: Kindly welcome to Innovation Dental Clinic

about.title: About our company
about.subtitle: Innovation Dental Clinic
about.text1: We provide a full range of dental and oral health care services. Our highly qualified team of specialists is ready to offer you professional assistance in the following areas:

list.text_1: Preventive dentistry: regular check-ups, teeth cleaning and care consultations.
list.text_2: Treatment of caries and gum diseases: filling of caries, removal of dental deposits, treatment of inflammation.
list.text_3: Aesthetic dentistry: teeth whitening, installation of veneers and crowns for a perfect smile.
list.text_4: Orthodontics: bite correction, installation of braces, transparent aligners.
list.text_5: Surgery: removal of wisdom teeth, tooth implantation, gum plastic.

politics.text_1: The course was created for cosmetologists to share information and experience for specialists who cannot attend training in person.
politics.text_2: The courses are introductory in nature with the technique of a cosmetologist.
politics.text_3: Distribution and sale of courses purchased on this site is prohibited.
